definition: half/semi-/incomplete/(after a number) and a half
Ming Dynasty (1368-1644)/surname Ming/Ming (c. 2000 BC), fourth of the legendary Flame Emperors, 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God
bright/opposite: dark 暗[an4]/(of meaning) clear/to understand/next/public or open/wise/generic term for a sacrifice to the gods

sentences.english: Blush can be poured through a hidden semi-transparent cover, very fitting skin.
sentences.chinese: 腮紅可透過隱藏的半透明罩倒出，極度貼合肌膚。

sentences.english: Well, Translucency is one of those phenomenon that goes a bit beyond your everyday Lambertian diffuse.
sentences.chinese: 那麼，這些現象是半透明多少超越你天天朗伯漫。

sentences.english: A library constructed with high walls of light diffused through large translucent glass.
sentences.chinese: 阿庫通過大規模建造的半透明玻璃漫射光高牆。

sentences.english: It consists of a semi-transparent media-facade echoing the latest news.
sentences.chinese: 它包括一個半透明的媒體表皮，這裏呈現最近的新聞。

sentences.english: Also supports translucent and auto hide for toolbar.
sentences.chinese: 還支持半透明和自動隱藏工具欄。

sentences.english: Under the transparent bonnet there are two extra lights helping the user to travel through the desert during night.
sentences.chinese: 半透明引擎蓋下方是車燈以便夜路旅行。
晶瑩剔透，半透明的青苔綠色。

sentences.english: The moonlight suddenly daubed all the things around with the color of half-transparent silver.
sentences.chinese: 那晚月色，一下把周圍一切都刷成了半透明的銀質。

sentences.english: Replacing the traditional instrument cluster are semitransparent digital gauges for speed and battery life.
sentences.chinese: 取代了傳統的半透明數字式速度和電池電量表。

sentences.english: Translucency and malleability properties are also good.
sentences.chinese: 半透明和可塑性性能也很好。
印花玻璃含25%半透明熔塊。

sentences.english: Translucence gives the material the ability to transmit and diffuse light.
sentences.chinese: 半透明給予材質以傳送和散播光的能力。

sentences.english: Displays bitmaps that have transparent or semitransparent pixels.
sentences.chinese: 顯示包含透明或半透明像素的位圖。

sentences.english: Paper that is soaked in oil to make it transparent and water-resistant.
sentences.chinese: 用油浸泡過的半透明的防水紙。

sentences.english: Wa anted the background of the form for one of my projects to be translucent.
sentences.chinese: 要爲我的項目之一窗體的背景是半透明的。

sentences.english: Leaves are another good example of thin translucency.
sentences.chinese: 另一個例子是葉薄半透明。

definition: Guangze county in Nanping 南平[Nan2 ping2] Fujian
